directions: Stir the black-eyed peas, black beans, garbanzo beans, chili beans, onion, ham, and garlic together in a slow cooker. Cook on Low for 5 hours. Top with sour cream to serve.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can chili beans in sauce
1 clove garlic, minced, or to taste
title: Slow Cooker Ham and Bean Stew
